src:
Prevozil znak stop, zapeljal pred tovornjak in umrl
Letos je na območju PU Celje že 22 ljudi umrlo v prometnih nesrečah, lani v enakem obdobju 11.
05 Nov 2019, 13:08 by T. V.
ŠENTJUR – Okoli 12.30 se je v Šentjurju zgodila prometna nesreča, v kateri sta bila udeležena voznik osebnega in voznik tovornega vozila. Po prvih podatkih voznik osebnega vozila, ki je vozil iz centra Šentjurja, ni ustavil pri znaku stop in je zavil v levo na glavno cesto, tedaj pa je vanj trčil tovornjakar, ki je pravilno pripeljal iz smeri Šmarja pri Jelšah.V trčenju se je 69-letni voznik osebnega vozila, doma z območja PP Šentjur, tako hudo poškodoval, da je na kraju nesreče umrl.Letos je v prometnih nesrečah na območju PU Celje umrlo 22 ljudi, lani v enakem obdobju pa 11, so sporočili s PU Celje.
text:
Passed the stop sign, drove in front of the truck and died
This year, 22 people died in road accidents in the Celje area, compared to the same period last year 11.
05 Nov 2019, 12:08 by T.V.
ŠENTJUR - A car accident involving a driver of a passenger car and a truck driver happened at around 12.30 in Šentjur. According to the first information, the driver of the passenger car driving from the center of Šentjur did not stop at the stop sign and turned left onto the main road, but at that moment a trucker, who drove correctly from Smar near Jelsah, collided. -year-old driver of a passenger car at home from the Šentjur PP area so badly injured that he died at the scene of an accident.
